elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: What does self-marketing involve?
elements.correctAnswer: All activities to build the most positive personal image possible

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What is the aim of self-marketing?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Why is the first impression crucial?
elements.correctAnswer: Because people form judgments very quickly.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What attitude underlies the offensive self-portrayal?
elements.correctAnswer: I can do that. That's what I do.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the risk of an offensive self-presentation?
elements.correctAnswer: The person may appear overbearing or arrogant.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: What is the risk of a defensive self-presentation?
elements.correctAnswer: The person may appear passive, insecure and less competent.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: What is the biggest difference between self-marketing on the Internet and analog forms of self-presentation?
elements.correctAnswer: An Internet presence makes me visible to a broad public and leaves a digital footprint.
